Sentencas: Ni-GDC cermet tubes (similar to 3 train inside diameter, 0.3-0.4 mm wall thickness and similar to 100 mm in length) with different amounts of porosity have been prepared by sintering of NiO-Ce(0.9)Gd(0.1)O(1.95)
The NiO-GDC nanopowders were synthesized by chemical route and the different pore density was obtained by modifying the processing conditions (calcining and adjustment of carbonous remains).
Ni-GDC cermets were obtained from the sintered NiO-GDC composites using reduction treatment at 700 degrees C for 3 h in reducing atmosphere (5 vol.% H(2)-95 vol.% At).
After the reduction process, tubes with 25-32% porosity were obtained.
Gas permeability and Hg porosimetry studies were used to evaluate permeability, pore distribution and pore density.
Electrical conductivity studies of the cermets were also performed, (C) 2009
